lender.name: Xavier
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate from my uncle who also loans. This started me on my way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 18 months old. My work is to keep my mom busy.

lender.name: nyccy
lender.loan_because: because it good to give than to receive
lender.occupational_info: i work with a charity organization here in the uk as a voluntee..taking care of the less preveledege..because i have been sprung with the ideas since i was a little girl.

lender.name: Diona
lender.occupational_info:
I have been involved in charity all my life and the one thing that stands out on my journey ,is just how unmotivated they are when they have nothing to look forward too.This money will create a centre for learning lifeskills(to stay off drugs )and computer savvy courses to get a job and uplift themselves for employment.I live in a small suburb where unemployment is high and drugs rife.There is no acivities and the future of our kids is at stake.We need funds to change this
Thanks

lender.name: Torben
lender.loan_because: They need it more than I do
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: People have had faith in my dreams - I would like to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: Our company which I started with my business partner provides computer services to large organizations.

lender.name: jack
lender.loan_because: I wasgiven a gift- to keep it you have to give it away..
lender.occupational_info: Retired Trucker

lender.name: Cissy
lender.loan_because: It makes my heart happy.

lender.name: Scott and Ambre
lender.loan_because: We feel very blessed and want to help give someone else a chance to feel that way too.
lender.occupational_info: He's a record producer and marketing brain and she is a happy homemaker.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: see PEP Lending Team page
lender.occupational_info: see PEP Lending Team page

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be successful and independent.

lender.name: jimachan
lender.loan_because: reduction of poverty,my self-respect , help to show one's capability, trust toward human-being and myself powerlessness

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I like to encourage people who are adventurous, brave and are determined to meet their goals, especially women trying to support their families with their own skills and talents.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: every woman should have the chance to build her dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Help people manage their money safely.

lender.name: Bronze
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their life by hard work, dedication, persistence, all values which I support and respect.
lender.occupational_info: I manage bank services and cash assets for my employer.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe that all God's People deserve the best in life and when we help those who help themselves it strengths the will of God!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Social Work Intern and I work for Child Welfare Services. I work with children and families who are poor and in need. It gives me great pleasure to know that I can make a difference in the life of a child and their families

lender.name: Diane
lender.occupational_info:
I have travelled throught North America as an insurance adjuster handling catastrophic losses, both property and injury.
As a claims examiner I bring my experience to assist other adjusters in bringing their files to conclusion. I currently work in a company that writes business in various high risk categories, from marine insurance to white water rafting to high value homes and more.
It is a busy and hectic job, but one that is interesting and different each day. It requires knowledge in many different areas and tact and professionalism dealing with both other professionals and those persons that have unfortunately been touched with some type of loss.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: Trade not aid
lender.occupational_info: People stuff

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: We believe the best hope for development is through micro finance. We want to help others make a life.
lender.occupational_info: We operate an adventure therapy program for troubled youth and experiential education programs for all ages.

lender.name: Marnie
lender.loan_because: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." - Margaret Mead.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to make investments that have a beneficial impact on the communities that they affect.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and optimize solar power plants.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I truly want to make a difference and Kiva is the fastest way to impact many people's lives in the shortest period of time . My family came to the United States as refugees and they were offered help by kind families and organizations. Now that I have the means to help others, why not.
lender.occupational_info: I am trained to understand the spoken and unspoken needs of consumers and address it with product solutions that are well thought through to improve an overall user experience while at the same time meet a reasonable price target and return good profit margins. My job is a glorified version of what these entrepreneurs on Kiva do on a daily basis.

lender.name: Anil
lender.loan_because: I have joined as a Lender in this forum, as I strongly believe that a borrower should get the finance his/her business idea deserves with respect and dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large company with 15000+ agents supporting (mostly American) customers from BPO centers in North America, Europe, India and the Phillippines.

lender.name: Linnéa
lender.loan_because: It was a birthday present from a very good friend that know me well. Thank you!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be able help good, honest hard working people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell bread to markets and restaurants

lender.name: Debra K
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help other people have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to obtain a bank loan by telling the bank the value of their home.

lender.name: Azon and Anthony
lender.occupational_info: We produce and edit videos and documentaries for TV and online.

lender.name: Sendur
lender.loan_because: it enables people.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for companies.

lender.name: Valeska
lender.loan_because: it fills my heart with joy :)

lender.name: Inga
lender.loan_because: I earn enough to get by. Others don't.

lender.name: Debbi and Pat
lender.loan_because: "Hide not your talents. For use they were made. What good is a sundial in the shade?" If we have resources that will help the talents of others shine, we're happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: Pat manages a business. Debbi helps new moms and babies learn to breastfeed.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a wonderful and effective way to help people help themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together
lender.occupational_info: I create spaces in which people work, live and play

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: i can...

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: In my travels to Mexico & Cuba I really got an appreciation of the poverty and the hard work an individual has to endure every day. These contributions are just a small way in which I can contribute to a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Stay at home Mom

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a good way to help people help themselves with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others directly or indirectly is an important part of my life.

lender.name: John & Kathleen
lender.loan_because: it makes us feel good to see people better themselves. Everyone deserves a break.
lender.occupational_info: Retired and loving it!

lender.name: Ha & BT
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself who has been lucky to have chances in the richt West. My wife has always supported me in the hardship of my early entrepreneur days. We like to help people, especially when the help is structural. Besides that we think that we're already lucky, we should help others to find theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I use the internet to let people from different countries over the world work together, from India, Ukraine, Germany and the Netherlands

lender.name: Graeme
lender.loan_because: It's my belief that to those whom much is given, much is expected. I want to share my good fortune with others around the world in a way that will help build their personal and societal infrastructure, enabling future generations to achieve more.

lender.name: Daniel & Leah
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference in someone's life. It's not charity it's a loan because everyone deserves the chance to dream big.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I would like the world to be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Enabler

lender.name: lee
lender.loan_because: i was working till three months ago and found out i need a liver transplant i got very weak and couldnt work anymore
lender.occupational_info: i pray i get better so i can participate in this program a lot of people need help to get their dreams off the ground and i do want to help as soon as i can god bless u all

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I like to help those that want to help themselves have better lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help business people, like those looking for loans through Kiva, understand if their business is profitable or help them to become profitable.

lender.name: rebecca m
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed!
lender.occupational_info: I raised two handsome and successful sons. I wrote for newspapers and worked as a teacher before I retired.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: More satisfying than Wall Street. These days, much less risky.
lender.occupational_info: We try to discover new medicines to make the people healthier.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.occupational_info: Engineer officer in the U.S. Army...we support counterinsurgency operations, construction, economic development, and geospatial engineering missions

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have been given a tremendous amount of support as I became a new mother to twins. I'd like to offer some support to someone else as they realize their dreams.

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help other is to help them help themselves. Teach man to fish.....
lender.occupational_info: I help families navigate through the legal justice system and assist them in adopting children

lender.name: Maxine
lender.loan_because: I believe its important for people to have the opportunity to accomplish their dreams and create a better lives for themselves.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to help where I can.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to help farmers in developing countries improve their homeland's food security

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: OGEER Inc.
lender.loan_because: OGEER Inc. believes that be giving people the opportunity to become economically independent they can improve their standard of living and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: OGEER Inc. believes that be giving people the opportunity to become economically independent they can improve their standard of living and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Di from Sydney
lender.loan_because: TBA

lender.name: Jonas Elliott
lender.loan_because: This is the true power of the internet, unveiled.
lender.occupational_info: I am obtaining a Master's degree in Engineering.

lender.name: oehoeboeroe
lender.occupation: assistent in a family docters practacy
lender.loan_because: two friends gave me a gift certificate on my birthday

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's a convenient way to help others do business, plus it's fun!

lender.name: BOINAY
lender.occupation: a family of 5 living in Tokyo Japan

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to realize their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I study how children learn to understand the world around them and how they learn to talk about it.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: Because I think single individuals or small groups are the best form of economic unit, able to make wiser decisions and do better for themselves than if they have to work for a large, indifferent, heartless mega-company.
lender.occupational_info: Clients turn to me to help them solve problems they're having, primarily about housing issues. I do research with consumers to discover why they are acting the ways that they do. My clients use that information to help them correct things, like poor customer service, that are driving people away.

lender.name: Daisy
lender.loan_because: KIVA gives me the opportunity to do a little for people who live in less rich parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a course coordinator.

lender.name: Faye
lender.occupational_info: I have the familiar job of Mother to two boys ages four and one. I work everyday to raise healthy, bright, well-rounded, thoughtful and respectful children.

lender.name: antoine m
lender.occupational_info: journaliste indépendant

lender.name: Natalie
lender.whereabouts: A quaint little town in Georgia, USA
lender.loan_because: It brings complete happiness to me, knowing that something so small can help others achieve things that are bigger than I will ever be able to understand. To see these people and to help them realize their hopes and dreams is one of my life's greatest honors.

lender.name: Chosei
lender.loan_because: I love to help people and it's a simple way to honor God.

lender.name: Judd
lender.loan_because: I'm a believer in the small business owner.

lender.name: Midori & Patrick
lender.loan_because:
It makes us feel good to help others!
In doing so, we also support Caitlin's efforts to help others in the world through her "Caitlins Team" fund raising.
We help others with a loan and we show Caitlin she can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info:
It's amazing to think that $25.00 can help change someone's life.
We love that this is a LOAN and it will be repaid to me so I may repeat the cycle and help another person.

lender.name: PEGGY
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel so very good. I worked long and hard most of my life. Retirement is great, I travel a lot, but participating in this work is very special to me.

lender.name: Jerri Linn
lender.loan_because: I want to know that everyone is able to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I work with information about cancer patients in hospitals across the US.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: A few years ago, I received tips from customers on my newspaper (exercise) route. I chose to share this generosity with entrepreneurs around the world. I continue to reloan this tip money.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: EVERY little bit helps. I feel incredibly blessed to be where I am today, and want to give other women that same chance.
lender.occupational_info: I study the history of France in the seventeenth century and teach European history to undergraduates.

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I´m happy to help - and I believe in the projects I support.
lender.occupational_info: Advising employees regarding payslip, benefits, contract issues.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up not a hand out. Being able to give something back to the people of Sierra Leone. A country I spent some time in during the late 70's.
lender.occupational_info: Work in the infrastructure management field for a environmental organization

lender.name: Yolanda
lender.loan_because: It is interesting. I wonder if the loan I am making will help someone. I wonder if they will be able to pay the money back. When I send money to a charity I can not see where the money goes. Here I feel a bit involved.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a store and sell things.

lender.name: Mason
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in somebody's life.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: God helps me when I need it, so I want to return the favor! :)
lender.occupational_info:
I teach English composition and literature at a Community College, as well as Women's Studies classes.
I am the president of the American Muslim Women's Association here in AZ, which does a variety of service work.
www.i-am-americanmuslim.org is my way to help create space for our young people (and old people like me!) to forge their own unique identity as American Muslims.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I believe in a better world
lender.occupational_info: I sell luxury journeys.

lender.name: Shea
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: student in third grade in the US

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: It is a very small thing that may help someone in a big way!

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: there is no bigger pleasure to give when somebody is in need ...!

lender.name: Mlen-Too Wesley
lender.loan_because: I believe.
lender.occupational_info: 168 hours a week being positive... just trying to save the world.

lender.name: Rui
lender.whereabouts: S.M. Feira Santa Maria da Feira

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: The money I have is not of my own, I am only it's temporary steward. Therefore I wish to use the money in a way my master would be proud of.

lender.name: Ianniello
lender.occupation: running a cooking school in Paris/France-Author

lender.name: Mari
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I want to assist in the eradication of poverty. I have come to understand that I have been blessed with food, clothing, and extra money each month and now I want to give back to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Andrews University as a graduate assistant to two professors. I assist in the teaching of undergraduate classes, I help shape curriculum, and I participate in office administration.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: Kiva is nothing short of brilliant. By providing an avenue of direct action, Kiva has been instrumental in helping me and other lenders turn our idealism for a more just world into a real practice that changes lives. It is a privilege to be able to stand among people of such good will around the world, and to be able to support these creative, hard-working entrepreneurs. Thank you, Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: People come to me when they are sick or in pain, and I help them through the practice of Chinese Medicine...herbs and acupuncture.

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I like to leverage my money by helping other people to improve their income/quality of life. As the very famous proverb says : "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime". Micro credit has proven to be a successful way of doing that.

lender.name: Serge
lender.loan_because:
"The earth is but one country and mankind its citizens." That's my inspiration.
"La terre n'est qu'un seul pays et tous les hommes en sont les citoyens"

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to lift themselves from poverty!

lender.name: Brady
lender.loan_because: this is something I believe in.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kimberley
lender.loan_because: I want to learn about entreprising women around the world, and support them as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help clinic patients give money to support my clinic's mission in health care, education and research.

lender.name: Jeff L.
lender.loan_because: Working under the assumption that globalization is here to stay, then giving the more means for individuals to participate in capitalism will raise all boats. Plus I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information and books.

lender.name: A.J.
lender.loan_because: Providing financing to entrepreneurs in developing countries is an excellent way to give an individual a chance to be successful and at the same time increase standards of living in that country.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student studying economics and international business.

lender.name: Beau Harrison
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a wonderful, well paying job and I need to share my fortune with the world.
lender.occupational_info: Fermilab is a high energy particle physics research institute. My coworkers and I are responsible for making science happen as efficiently as possible.

lender.name: Ava
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Susie's 1st born daughter

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I am learning to give to others that have less than me. This is a good way to touch other lives in the world.

lender.name: Benicia High SAGE
lender.loan_because: We are the Benicia HS SAGE team and we are committed to helping entrepreneurs around the world live their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Students for the Advancement of Global Entrepreneurship (SAGE) are high school students around the world who complete business and social ventures to improve their communities and those they touch globally. At the end of the academic year, the student teams showcase their efforts on a regional, national and world stage. Benicia High has been the California State champion twice, and in 2009, placed second in the nation and fifth at the World Competition in Brasilia, Brazil.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Because of my Fantastic friends who first donated for me to lend.
lender.occupational_info: i replace the the teeth that people have lost.

lender.name: KKH
lender.loan_because: I like investing in people.
lender.occupational_info: I perform medical ultrasound imaging.

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: I used to be homeless and it was through the help of others that I'm now able to work, and soon go back to college. I think it is good Karma to help others that want to help themselves. My goal is to be a doctor, and I want to help others achieve their goals too.
lender.occupational_info: I cook food for many people everyday at the Burger King. I make drinks, and accept payment for meals. I also clean the dining area, and take out the trash. I get to see and talk to many different people everyday.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I believe that the world can be a better place than it is today. By lending, I hope that I can help people lift other people, along with their families and communities out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I attend American University where I am pursuing degrees in Political Science, Public Communication, and Economics

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: To honor my Heavenly Father.
lender.occupational_info: I run a machine shop that makes parts for other company's products.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an auditor for a large accounting firm. We help ensure that the financial statements issued by other companies are free from significant errors.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I like using technology to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to share information with each other, find things and use technology to accomplish tasks through the internet.

lender.name: Lulu
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: live life with wonder’s vision & purpose is to encourage a renewed sense of wonder in life, living each day fully, abundantly, passionately and inspiringly to inspire mothers / women with spiritual interests through a quality, educational medium - manifesting mums a reminder to continually awaken to the inner connectedness to 'all that is', connecting to the unlimiting universe to write, print and publish universal wisdom creatively in beautiful children's books to build your acknowledgement muscle, reminding you that through praise we are able to heartfully 'gift' each other

lender.name: Igor
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Living in a metro city, we tend to forget how privileged we are. We get sad because, we do not have the car we want, nor the apartment at waterfront, or maybe even the looks we'd like. These things are allright, but they tend to blind us to more important things in life such as health, companionship, hunger, love. Alot of times we can not do much about our circumstances, but for $25 we can improve someone else 's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a system administrator for a payments company in British Columbia. My usual duties include: updating firewalls, setting up services such as voip, suirvalence, vpn, mail, and daily server maintnance. 99% of our servers are Open Source friendly!

lender.name: Christal
lender.loan_because: it's amazing to see people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help my bank decide if and how much we should loan US power companies.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I am able to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom to 3 children, two dogs and a husband. We live a quiet life in Colorado, US. I am also a photographer and fiber artist.

lender.name: Takeshi T.
lender.occupational_info: Development Assistance

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people who can't buy what they need in order to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 12 year old 6th grade student who tries hard in school.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because:
I don't have much, but I have more than some and believe God wants us to leave this world a better place than before we came into it.
God Bless America.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: I am interested in Social Entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a start-up company called Donations2Dollars. We assist non-profits fundraising programs by providing a new and easy way to make donations to your favorite non-profit. Visit www.donations2dollars.com for more information.

lender.name: Claire and Ian
lender.loan_because: It's great to help others!

lender.name: Ryder
lender.occupational_info: I work at a very busy coffee shop. I take orders and pour espresso shots to create a variety of drinks.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I help manifest dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to take responsibility for their lives through movement awareness.

lender.name: Lily and Keenan
lender.loan_because: we believe in the power of microfinance as a sustainable approach to poverty alleviation. As global citizens, we want to make a difference in this world, and encourage you to take part in this movement.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant to a sculptor. I manage the business so she is free to create the art.

lender.name: Margery
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother of four. My husband is a school teacher.

lender.name: Garage Sale Blog Network
lender.occupational_info: An eclectic mix of Garage Sale items coming at you in humanistic form. This is the Garage Sale Blog - 13 people, 13 strands of life, 13 very different ways of looking at the world.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy lending because it is a very practical way to help other people.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you? This is the gift that keeps giving back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I wake up, go to class, read a lot, go to bed and repeat five days a week...

lender.name: Tine
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: ...I want to contribute to heal the world.
lender.occupational_info: Kiva is one of the million possible ways to heal the world. ;-) Furthermore it's one of the easiest; but nevertheless a very efficient one!

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: particularly in this market, there is no better return on an investment than making people's lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large financial firm in New York City, and I love it!

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I would like to impart a change in the life of someone even for a day by lending money that would go a long way to helping them step out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and export cocao and coffee abroad.I also work as a leader of a small charity group in Cameroon called City of Light Foundation. That sponsors orphans in schools.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: Because I want to in prove and to contribute in the area of civilization and education to the globe
lender.occupational_info: An outstanding and interested as well as development

lender.name: don
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Camilo
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I think Jesus would do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a non-profit organization that provides treatment for children who suffer from physical and developmental problems.

lender.name: The Davis Family
lender.loan_because: This is a family activity to show our children the value of hard work and to be a good global citizen.

lender.name: Panutat
lender.loan_because: I believe a little bit of help can go a long way. It takes very little effort to change an entire life and community.
lender.occupational_info: I own several businesses including a software company and night club.

lender.name: Marypat
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to offer these monies to others. My son in law is native to Sierra Leone so I feel a connection there. We are all the same people wherever we live in this world. i love to give, I love to receive and I love to get to know people and their different lives. Thank you
lender.occupational_info: I live in Homer, Alaska with my partner Jules who is the love of my life,and our 3 dogs. I love to swim, fish, walk my dogs, look for Moose, watch the birds, create and wear dresses that twirl. I work as an appraiser, inspecting real property (land and/or structures) to estimate an accurate value and verify the condition of the property and its improvements.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I fix that which make others productive.

lender.name: Marsha
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room.

lender.name: Johnathan
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers - hardware, software, and networking. I'm also studying to be an Electrical Engineer.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: it's a small way to make a big difference - and it's fun!

lender.name: Arjun
lender.loan_because: It's seems like such a simple way to help people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and an editor of magazines and websites.

lender.name: Max Volpi
lender.loan_because: I like concrete acts.
lender.occupational_info: ...in progress...

lender.name: Kati
lender.loan_because: the loans give individuals a chance to take advantage of business opportunities; and lending teaches me good business sense, too
lender.occupational_info: I work with Prisma Microfinance, and MFI like yours!

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I really like the way Kiva is set up. Not only do you know where your money is going, you get to see and read about the impact that your money (and other people's money) has on the people from around the world. It is a fantastic idea and I am very glad to be a part of this, even in a tiny way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student working towards becoming a registered nurse (one day possibly a nurse practitioner).

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: i believe small things can make big differences - all people need is a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies buy other companies or sell themselves

lender.name: Ritva
lender.loan_because: I like to share dreams of people.

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: I help because I am able to at this time. We all come from the same puddle of life.
lender.occupational_info: I have been an activist for years for human rights issues. I am of Oklahoma Choctaw Indian blood.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's good karma!

lender.name: Jogusto
lender.loan_because: Our lives here in the US are so full and rich, there is more than enough to share with those who really want to make a change in *their* world.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work for the high-tech industry managing software development. Now I try to make money with investments. I hope to make a *lot* and share a *lot* of that success with everyone I love and those who are still in need.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: After visiting Tanzania, in 2008, I heard about Kiva and wanted to support small business owners there....eventually I lent to entrepreneurs in other countries too.

lender.name: "J"
lender.loan_because: To help families around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work to bring skills from outside very big businesses to help them become better at what they do.

lender.name: Surya
lender.loan_because: I believe all people are capable of great things if they are given the opportunity they need to excel.

lender.name: San Juana
lender.loan_because: I like to contribute to improve the lifes of others. I find happiness in helping people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I worked all my life in the non-profit sector helping people moved out of poverty and helping people to acquire safe and affordable homes.

lender.name: Marie-Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs around the world make a living with dignity

lender.name: J.O. Alt
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: Real estate / Remodels

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I love helping people!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student, and I am going to be receiving a degree to teach mathematics. After I graduate I will be entering the Peace Corps to teach math in another country!!!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to try their aspirations
lender.occupational_info: 44, avid runner and fitness buff in love with city living

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Caring for and loving my son
